mapper.sql: emp_id, emp_name, emp_type, emp_date, emp_gw, emp_zz
mapper.insert:
insert into t_emp
emp_id,
emp_name,
emp_type,
emp_date,
emp_gw,
emp_zz,
#{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{empType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{empDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_emp
emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_type = #{empType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_date = #{empDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_gw = #{empGw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_zz = #{empZz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_emp set emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_type = #{empType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_date = #{empDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_gw = #{empGw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_zz = #{empZz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from t_emp as a left join emp_type as b on a.emp_type = b.type_id
mapper.update: update t_emp set emp_name = #{empName},emp_type = #{empType},emp_date = #{empDate},emp_gw = #{empGw},emp_zz = #{empZz} where emp_id = #{empId}
